samahara pirimi,gahanu aya innawa jiwithe ketiyi joliyen inna ona kiyala hamadema karana, thawath kenekge hagim amathaka karala jiwath wena e aya thamunge ramuwata kotuwela inna aya.me aya wenuwen apith kathakaranna ona.

aya widiye goda nagiliwalata muwa wi ohugen pala yamata uthsaha dariya.

midemuda?shraddhawen dharmaya dakimabududahamata erehi panawalata pilithuruswamini, his labu kabal jalaye gilenawa dutuwemiwedanawen athmidima biya ha wedanawagiju lihiniya men papi maraya paradawamuniwi pahan wi sith sanasewabrahma guna athi mawupiyoshri subramaniyam wiharastha shri wimalananda daham pasalachuladhamma samadana suthrayadukata hethuwa thrushnawayikaraniya meththa suthrayalokaya naraka da?aananda hamuduruwopawahan parithyaga kirime pinkamakputhagen paligath piyek...therani giniwan dakinnata sudusukama kumakda?mada yi math ussan aawa achcharu pettiyaragayen thorawa rasawindinnapupurassa shri subramaniyam wiharayasuddhodana rajathumage sahodarayaku wu, amithodana rajathuma nisa ema aga bisaw kusa pilisindagena dasa ekada masak awamen kaliyuga warsha dedahas harasiya ata saththawak wu wesak masa pura pasaloswak pohoya lath kiwi dina hewath apa maha bosathanan wahanse upan dinayehi pinwath kumarek bihiwiya.

ganakadhikaranaya, alewikaranaya saha laghulebana widyawa pilibanda madhya mattame patamalada sampadanaya karana ladi. 1953 warshayedi lanka karmika widyalayehi kala saha kalashilpa anshaya rajaye saundarya widyalaya namin wu nawa departhamenthuwa wetha anuyuktha kara pawarana ladi. 1960 di katubaddehi aluthin pihituwana lada prayogika thakshanaya pilibanda purnakalina patamalawanda pawara dena ladi.

jorj behar 11 nowambar 1922 (1922-11-11) (wayasa 97) rotardam, nedarlanthaya jorj blek (upatha jorj behar 11 nowambar 1922) yanu, depathi charapurushayek lesin sowiyat sangama sewayehi yedi sitima nisa prachalithawu, hitapu brithanya charapurushayeki.
